characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: When an enemy unit is set up (other than during deployment or when disembarking)  you can immediately set up a unit of Deathmarks that was set up in a hyperspace oubliette on the battlefield, anywhere more than 9" away from enemy models and within 12" of the enemy unit that has just been set up.  You can then make a shooting attack with this unit as if it were your Shooting phase, but this attack must target the enemy unit that was just set up.
